author: The School of Life
description:
The fastest route to confidence is to stop being so attached to one’s dignity and seriousness; and plainly admit that one is – of course – an idiot. We all are.  

Enjoying our Youtube videos? Get full access to all our audio content, videos, and thousands of thought-provoking articles, conversation cards and more with The School of Life Subscription: https://t.ly/fVoVx

Be more mindful, present and inspired. Get the best of The School of Life delivered straight to your inbox: https://t.ly/ogkey

The School of Life runs a global online psychotherapy service that assists clients from over 40 countries. To find out more and book a session today, please visit our website: https://t.ly/xP3EL

FURTHER READING

“The topic of confidence is too often neglected by serious people: we spend so much time acquiring technical skills, so little time practising the one virtue that will make those skills effective in the world...”

You can read more on this and other topics here:  https://goo.gl/35CfL
title: How to Be Confident #animation #confidence #mentalhealth

author: The School of Life
description:
Emotional Intelligence, Daily. Start now: https://www.theschooloflife.com/subscription/ 
Discover The Rule of Simplicity in relationships. We often glorify emotional complexity, but what if true, mature love isn't about endless puzzles and misunderstandings? This insightful piece explores why genuine connection should feel straightforward, offering a vital perspective on identifying healthy, viable partnerships and when it's time to let go of needless complications. #HealthyRelationships #LoveLife #DatingAdvice #EmotionalIntelligence #SelfWorth
Unlock all the content of The School of Life with a subscription to our podcast, articles, videos, and exercises, specially tailored to your needs.
